choices: Go to your classes at the college
Head off to work for the day
Spend some time with your sisters
1.content:
You slowly awoke from your sleep. As you rubbed your eyes you looked over at the clock and saw that it read five thirty. It was a Thursday and you were no longer protected. Since you were now 18 there was no one to protect you. At your height you knew this could only mean trouble. You slowly made your way out of bed, it was a handmade bed suited for your size. Mona couldn’t wait to get her hands on you now that your protection has expired. Though you didn’t think anything would happen, unprovoked, you didn’t want to risk it. Eventually you were fully awake and could think clearly. You knew you had something to do today but you couldn’t quite remember.
What were your plans for the day?
1.title: A New Day

choices: She was going to give you another try
Give you to another student as a pet
11.content:
You remembered that you had your first day of school today. Even though you were only three inches tall, you were still able to get an education at the local technical college. You were practicing to become a chef. The college was aware of your situation and assured safety. With everyone still asleep, you made your way to the college. By the time you got there it was eight twenty and class was about to begin. You hurried to your cooking class and was greeted by Miss Harris, the teacher. She was 30 years old and had medium brown hair, cool green eyes, the body of a goddess, and a strict attitude. With a gentle hand she picked you up and introduced herself to you and introduced you to the class. It was a small class, only about six students including you. The rest of the class was all female.
After the introductions, Miss Harris placed you at your workspace, which was between a good looking brunet with blue eyes and a tall black haired beauty with an attitude both appeared around 19. Miss Harris then began class by asking the students to create a dish, any dish, to use as a benchmark. As usual, you were at a disadvantage with your height. You tried to assemble a dish but as time expired you had nothing. “Well, Sam,” Miss Harris said, “it looks like you failed to put together anything. I hope you can improve.” You tired to assure her you could but she didn’t buy it. “I need to make a statement that failure isn’t an option.” She continued, “Do you know what I am going to do?” You had no idea but you knew it wasn’t good as Miss Harris picked you up and brought you to face level.

What did she have in mind?
11.title: Small At School

choices: A Sandwich from the sandwich station
112.content:
Miss Harris then called over the black haired female and gave you to her. “Here you go, Nora, he is yours.” She said as Nora headed back to her seat. You couldn’t believe you were being treated like this. As Miss Harris continued with class you were placed in between Nora’s bulbous breasts. If was quite comfortable and you soon yourself asleep. You figured it wasn’t all bad. A few hours later you were awoken as Nora gently grabbed you and placed you on the plastic topped table. “Listen, my little pet.” She said, “I’m in charge and what I say goes.” You looked around and noticed that there was no one in sight. “You got a problem with that?” Nora asked. You shook your head no, and then watched in fear as she ate her food. She had purchased a pack of sushi and a vegetarian foot long sub. “What’s the matter,” Nora inquired as she noticed you staring at her food, “Are you hungry?” You nodded and Nora looked sympathetic. “I could share, I guess. What would you like?” You thought about. The dining hall was cavernous and catered to many different tastes but you were able to narrow it down to two.

What did you choose?
112.title: Student's Pet

choices: She had a change of heart and helped you
1122.content:
“All right then!” Nora picked you up and carried you over to the sandwich station. There was any sandwich ingredient you could want. But when you told Nora what you wanted she seemed insulted and proceeded to throw you into the bread bin telling you to get it yourself. You tried to construct your sandwich and was doing quite well. You had already moved a slice of white bread onto the plate, under Nora’s watchful eye. You were halfway done, spreading the mustard, adding the cheese, lettuce, and tomato slice, when Nora lost her patience. “You are so slow!” she yelled at you, “I have half a mind to leave you right here and now.” You begged her for mercy.

What did Nora do?
1122.title: A Samwich

choices: to the head of student affairs
To the kitchen to see the head chef
11221.content:
You were heartbroken as you saw Nora turn around and leave you. However, you still tried to construct your sandwich. After a half hour, you had finished your sandwich and began to eat it. All was going well until you felt the plate move under you. You turned around and saw that the student cleaner was unaware that you were there. You tired to get her attention and eventually she saw you. With a look of surprise she grabbed you with her yellow glove. You tried to explain your situation but she wouldn't listen. Instead she placed you in her cleavage and continued about her way, mentioning something of taking you to a higher authority.

Where was she taking you?
11221.title: Left at the Station

choices: Put the last slice of bread on for you and you had a nice lunch together.
Put you on the sandwich and put the bread on you. She has you for lunch.
11222.content:
You beg for her to stay and be patient with you. You explain how being small isn't as convenient as being at normal size. "Being small is hard because things that are relatively weightless to you, like bread and other sandwich ingredients, are much heavier and harder to move for me," you said. Nora's mood lightened a little, "I don't know, you are pretty pitiful. You may be small but, that stuff still weighs hardly anything. You should be able to move faster." You sighed, "If I have help it will go faster, and we can have a nice lunch together. So, will you please help me make myself a sandwich?" Nora smiled at what you said.

What happened? What did She do?
11222.title: Nora Will Help?

choices: It's a joke. All is well
112221.content:
Nora gladly helped you finish creating your sandwich, and carried both you and the sandwich back on the tray. She sat down at the table and the two of you enjoyed a nice lunch together. You were finding yourself attracted to this woman, despite your relationship with your current girlfriend. About 30 minutes later, the two of you had finished lunch and Nora asked if you wanted some ice cream. You said yes, and so Nora carries you over to the ice cream machine, grabbed a cone, filled the cone with vanilla, then stuck you in the center of the ice cream. Before you could protest at this blindside, you were covered in chocolate sauce, caramel sauce, whipped cream, and a cherry was placed on your head. "What are you doing?" you yelled at her. "You are just so sweet, I couldn't resist." Nora responded with a giggle.

Was Nora playing?
112221.title: Lunch for Two, Dessert for One?

choices: She bit down and chewed you in to bits...
She takes the bite, but sucks your whole body in with it. (Swallowed whole.)
112222.content:
You were waiting for Nora to help you get the top slice of bread onto the sandwich when you heard a rumbling noise. You turned and found that you were level with Nora's belly which was just barely covered by her shirt. It was making the growling sounds of a belly that was still hungry. You looked up and saw a smile spread across her face as she stared at you, the top piece of bread in her left hand. You saw her take her right hand and nudge you forward towards the sandwich with her pointer finger. "What are you doing," you asked as you turned to face the sandwich because the nudge nearly made you lose balance and you had to turn to keep from falling. You then felt her finger flick you hard in the back and you fell forward and onto the sandwich, and heard her giggle, "Well, I decided to help make you a sandwich, but my hungry belly has made me think of having one more thing for lunch, you." You felt as she covered you with the top slice of bread, patted it down to pin you in, and placed the plate on a tray.
         "So I did help make you a sandwich, but not one for you to eat, but as part of one for me to gobble up," Nora said. Nora then got some cherry soda from the drink dispenser and headed back to the cashier. She was charged for a drink and a standard sandwich. The cashier had no idea that Nora had made a sandwich that was anything but standard, because you were still situated right in the middle, barely able to move. You started to wiggle your way through the sandwich to one end as Nora went and sat down. You finally made it to where you could poke your head and shoulders out of the end, and you came face to face with Nora, who had brought the sandwich up close to her mouth. "The professor, she did tell me that she was letting me have you as my pet, but I think you will be much more useful as lunch," Nora said and then opened her mouth and started moving your section straight towards it. You got closer and closer and saw her tongue salivating in anticipation. You realized this was it for you; your lovely classmate was going to devour you for lunch.

How did it happen?
112222.title: Change Of Order

1122222.content:
As you entered the dark, moist cavern, you found yourself bypassing the pearl white swords and traveling straight down her throat. With a plop you landed in her stomach and quickly blacked out due to the fumes as you did, you heard Nora say, "You were too sweet!".

However, you awoke. Though as you looked around, the room was not familiar to you. Just then you heard a scream, that was familiar. You had somehow reformed in Nora's bedroom. "What are you doing here?" she exclaimed as she grabbed you. "I ate you yesterday!" she said, "Unless you can reform, in that case, I'm the luckiest girl in the world!" She carried you downstairs and out of the apartment. "I have a busy day, today, but you're welcome to join me and keep me nourished, I mean company." she said. You had no choice so you complied as she got into her car.

Where was she going?
1122222.title: This is Highly Irregular

choices: She places you on a students chair so you can "Feel how hard they work."
She has you eat crumbs from her heels to help you "Appreciate" Food
You have to learn what it's like to be food...she pretends to eat you.
113.content:
Before the teacher could explain her idea the bell rang, students began filing out of the room post-haste without even giving a second glance towards you and the Goddess of a teacher. It happened fairly often after all, it just wasn’t normal she’d discuss punishments. That was what worried you. You let out a nervous chuckle, “Heh, well it looks like class is over Ms. Harris. I better get going before I’m late. Could you please set me down an-”

“You won’t be going anywhere Mr. Johnson.” You shirked into your shirt as Ms. Harris stared at you strictly; Ms. Harris was mad, that was never a good thing. “Do you realize how many times you’ve failed to make a dish?”

“Uh…a few times…?” You didn’t want to even place a number on it, you just stared at the teacher’s open cleavage for some mild comfort as the lecture began.

“Try 32 times. I can understand not finishing a few times, but you’re doing nothing but fail.” She continued to stare you down with those menacing eyes.

“B-But that’s not my fault. I’m tiny. I can’t just cook something fancy when I can’t even hold a spoon!”

Ms. Harris did not like your explanation, “Excuses! I never expected a fancy dish from you. I’m not some sort of monster Mr. Johnson. I wanted small things from you, perhaps an appetizer sample, even a cracker with some cheese. Anything is better than nothing!”

“But…”

“No buts! I didn’t want to have to do this Mr. Johnson but you’ve honestly left me with no choice. For the next few days you’ll be my personal slave. If you haven’t learned by the end of it, not only will you fail my class, but the position will become permanent. Do I make myself clear?” Her imposing figure loomed over you, a face big enough to engulf you in its size.

The situation wasn’t even close to fair though, and you were going to explain that. “That’s not fair Ms. Harris! I can’t help I-“

“I don’t appreciate slackers Mr. Johnson! Whether you like it or not you are my slave for now. In fact, it would be better if you disliked it; maybe the lesson will be learned.” Her increasingly loud tone silenced you with its power; you cowered in her mere presence. “Good, maybe now you can learn. Let me set a few ground rules. Never speak unless I tell you to; you are to always refer to me as Goddess Sarah (First Name) or Goddess Harris. Whichever name you prefer. And lastly, you will do everything I say without question. Is that clear?”

“Y-Ye-“You cut yourself off as Ms. Harris squeezed her fingers together, making you scream in pain. “What did I just say slave?!” You remembered the first rule and nodded weakly.

“Good…now we have a few minutes before the students will arrive so I’ll give you a brief task to start you off.” She gestured to a spilt egg on the floor, “One of my students dropped that and never cleaned it up. That will be your job.” She set you on the floor beside it, keeping herself right there to watch.

Nervously you looked back to your temporary Goddess, face to face with her heels. Following them up you soon saw the black nylons, the cooking apron over a skirt, and a busty blouse. Goddess Sarah was certainly a beauty; you couldn’t believe she just so suddenly made you a slave. It seemed so…wrong. Then again women seemed to love doing that around you, you sighed sadly. The Goddess before you stomped a foot, “I’d start if I were you. Otherwise my foot might wind up on you.”

You didn’t need any more persuasion; you ran up the egg half your size and motioned to pick it up. Ms. Harris interrupted again, “Not that way slave! You’re supposed to eat it! That student put hard work into his dish, the least you can do is appreciate his effort.” You sighed, but it wasn’t anything that new in your life. You started eating the egg off the floor. Thankfully it was a small one, and the floors weren’t that dirty; you finished relatively quickly. Right as students were heard outside the door.

“Good,” The woman lifted you up again. “But it seems you still don’t appreciate food, at least not the way it should be. That might be why you’re such a slacker in my class.” You rolled your eyes; smart enough to only do that and not speak back again.

“So…I’ve figured out a good way for you to appreciate food and those who prepare it…”
113.title: Teachers Pet

114.content:
“I will not tolerate failure, Sam,” Miss Harris explained as she placed you in her desk drawer for later. You were surrounded by darkness for what seemed like eternity until Miss Harris reopened the drawer a few hours later. She calmly placed you on her desktop as well as a brown paper bag. You didn’t have a good feeling about this. “You see, Sam, I take my class very serious and those you fail are punished.” Miss Harris clarified as she unpacked her lunch. You stood in awe at the size of her food. She had packed an apple, a bottle of water, a bag of chips, and a BLT on white minus the B. Miss Harris removed the top of the sandwich, revealing a span of lettuce, and ushered you on. “I may not have any bacon, but I’m sure you’ll do just fine.” She said with a smile. You shook with fear as you lay on the cold green leaf. She then replaced the top slice and you were immediately covered in yellow goo as the white slice of bread covered you. You were now in the middle of her sandwich, no different than the tomatoes, cheese, lettuce, or pickles. You could do nothing as you felt the sandwich rise into the air. “This is much better than detention.” Miss Harris said with a giggle as she took the first bite of the sandwich. You knew she would get you next. As you watched the beauty swallow you couldn’t help but admire her body. Just as the goddess came in for the next bite, the door opened. It was the dean of the school, a very attractive woman of about 34 with red hair, steel blue eyes and a definite attitude. You tried to get her attention as she talked with Miss Harris and as the dean turned away to leave, she took a second glance at Miss Harris.

Did she notice you?
114.title: Being One With The Food

choices: Greta, she wasn't going to leave you
1141.content:
Just then, the dean stopped in mid sentence. "Excuse me," she said, "but is that a student in your sandwich?" Before Miss Harris could respond, you were already in the hands of the dean as she stormed out of the room and into her office. You saw the secretary look at you as she licked her lips. At least you were in the dean's grasp. She set you down on her desk, and introduced herself as Greta and apologized for the behavior of the staff. She assured you complete safety. Just then, Greta got a call and was forced to leave. "Don't worry," she said, "I'll be right back." She placed you in her desk drawer and rushed out. A few minutes later, the drawer was opened and a hand grabbed you.

Who did the hand belong to?
1141.title: Student Appeals

1142.content:
To your dismay, you remained unseen and the dean left not knowing of the act that was about to take place. “That sure was close, my little treat.” Miss Harris said as she licked her crimson lips. You knew this was the end and there was no way to stop it. As her sword sharp daggers cut into the sandwich all around you, you knew that the sound of the lettuce crunching and of the tomatoes being squished was the sound of death. As you came in contact with the hot and moist climate of her mouth the only thing you could do was try not to be crushed by her pearl white molars. Not too long after you entered the maw of the goddess, a torrent of water washed all evidence down her throat.

Do you reform safely?
1142.title: The Life Of Food

11421.content:
As you began to feel the sting of digestion, you blacked out. When you came to, you looked around and noticed you were in your bed the clock read twelve twenty the next day. You couldn’t believe it. Your reformation must have had something to do with the chemicals that shrank you in the first place. You were so happy you were alive. As you entered into the kitchen for some lunch you were immediately scooped up by Kimberly. “Why Sam, aren’t you supposed to be at school today?” she said with a kind look on her face but mischief in her eye. You explained to her the whole situation and by the end, she had a very skeptical look on her face. “You expect me to believe that you reformed? Preposterous! I think you were skipping school. However, if you are telling the truth, this is amazing. Let’s test it out.” Kimberly said as she set you on the kitchen counter. You hoped you could reform twice as you knew what was going to happen. “What can I make you for lunch Sam?” Kimberly asked with a smile.

How did you respond?
11421.title: No Place Like Home

114212.content: You asked for some soup. Kimberly acknowledged you and started preparing the soup. A little while later she placed a steaming bowl down in front of you. "Well," she said, "get in and let's see if you do reform." You complied and entered the soup. Kimberly grabbed a spoon and began to eat the soup. Eventually it was your time as you passed through her cherry red lips into the moist cavern and down her throat. You blacked out. But awoke the next day, reformed. Kimberly was in shock. Then a grin came across her face. She grabbed you and then rushed down to the kitchen. Once there she called the local bar and, to your shock, she sold you to the bar as a permanent waiter and menu item on ladies night, which was every night. Kimberly drove you down to the bar where she handed you over to the owner. She was a tall brown haired beauty named Mia. "Look at our new employee," she said as Kimberly drove off. Mia already had your first assignment planned.
114212.title: A Soupy Swim and A Bar Exam

11422.content:
As you landed in her stomach you tried to beg for mercy. Yet all you got in return was laughter. There was no chance of survival and with that knowledge, you climbed up on a piece of sandwich and waited for the end.
Miss Harris finished her lunch and immediately found herself rejuvenated. She headed down to the laboratory with a cotton swab she rubbed on Sam. She ran it through the machines and synthesized the chemicals that caused the shrinking. Miss Harris made it back to her class with a vial of the solution just as lunch ended. She greeted her class and then asked each of them to try her new “energy drink”. Before she knew it, Miss Harris found herself with a whole jarful of new morsels. Miss Harris laughed as she set the jar on her desk and began planning out her menu.
11422.title: Nutritional Sam

12.content:
You realized you had to go to work today. You headed out and arrived at the bakery around seven thirty, just barely beating bakery owner and secret crush Rachael. She was a 24 year old busty bombshell with short blonde hair, brown eyes and an attitude that was unpredictable. “Ah, Sam,” she said as she unlocked the door, “I see you’re coming in to work early. I like it.” Rachael picked you up, gave you a little kiss and carried you into the bakery, setting you on the counter. You always had a thing for Rachael and had thought about asking her out in spite of Nicole. “Sam, I need you to get to work on those cupcakes. The customer is going to pick them up today and I need them ready.” Rachael said as she opened up the shop. You headed to the back and started adding the ingredients to the mixing bowl. Though you were only three inches tall, the kitchen had been altered to adjust for your size. Just as you were about to crack an egg into the large green porcelain bowl, you slipped and fell into the gooey cupcake batter.
You couldn’t climb up the steep sides of the bowl. You tried to scream for Rachael’s help but she couldn’t hear you. Eventually the batter pulled you under. A few minutes later Rachael came into the kitchen to see your progress. Not seeing you anywhere she picked up the bowl and began to pour the batter into the cupcake molds. If she was going to see you, now was the time.

Did Rachael see you?
12.title: Hard At Work

121.content:
“Oh my! Sam what happened?” Rachael exclaimed as your unconscious body was uncovered by the batter. Rachael swiftly grabbed you, and ran you under the sink faucet. Eventually you came to. “That was too close. You better work up front and I’ll take care of the baking.” Rachael said as she gave you a little kiss and set you on the front counter. It wasn’t too long after Rachael left that a very attractive 19 year old entered the bakery. She had medium brown hair, cool blue eyes, and a gorgeous form. As she approached the counter, you could tell she was in shock of seeing someone of your height. “Oh, hi there.” she said, “My name’s June.” You were in awe of her beauty from the start. You asked how you could help her. She rattled off a list, “I think I’ll take a half dozen muffins, a loaf of white bread, a blueberry pie, and you.” Before you could say anything, June swiped you off the counter and placed you in her cleavage; she then gathered her items, left the amount of money on the counter and was about to head out. Before she could leave, Rachael came out of the back to wish the customer well; June smiled and began to walk out. As she was walking out, Rachael realized something was wrong.

Did Rachael realize you were gone?
121.title: Working the Front Desk

1211.content:
Just as you thought you were gone, Rachael yelled at June. Before you even knew what happened, Rachael had taken you back and had threatened to call the police. After June had left, Rachael set you down on the front counter. “Sam, I can’t continually save you. I have a business to run. I’m sorry but I’m going to have to let you go.” She said with sadness in her voice. You couldn’t believe what you were hearing. You were so shocked at what you were hearing you collapsed. You awoke a time later, only to see yourself tied up. “I’m sorry it had to be like this. I really liked you,” Rachael said, “I can’t let you leave. Instead, I am going to flip this coin. Heads, I make you my slave, pet, and maybe meal. Tails, I add you to the display window as an item for sale.” Rachael then flipped the coin into the air. You watched with anticipation as it landed.

How did it land?
1211.title: You're Fired

12112.content:
To your disappointment, the coin landed tails side up. "I really am sorry it had to be this way," Rachael said as she took you over to the front window and placed you on one of the trays. Rachael went back to work but before too long, a female entered the bakery, went up to the front desk and inquired about "the tiny guy in the window". Before you could identify who the mysterious buyers was, you found yourself stuffed into a bag. After a bumpy trip of what seemed like half an hour, you were removed from the bag and found yourself staring face to face with...

Who purchased you?
12112.title: Tough Day at Work

1212.content:
To your dismay, Rachael never realized you were missing. Instead you found yourself in June’s cleavage as she headed back to her apartment. On the bright side, she was very attractive; however it was still so shocking how she stole you. Before too long, June had arrived at her apartment, set you on the counter and started putting away the baked goods. “Looks like I got something that wasn’t on my list.” June said with a giggle as she put the loaf of bread in the bread box. You were scared but didn’t show it as the goddess picked you up. “What shall we do today, my little pet?” June asked, “We could go shopping at the mall or just hang out here. Your choice.” You thought about it for a little while but then made your decision.

What did you choose?
1212.title: Bringing Work Home

122.content:
Unfortunately, Rachael was too preoccupied with getting the batter in the molds to notice a 3-inch man struggling in the mix. When the molds were all done, she baked them in the oven. Even though it was extremely hot, you were able to survive due to the batter around you shielding you.

When the cupcakes were done, she took them out, put frosting on them, and put them in a box for display. A woman ended up buying the cupcake tray. You eventually struggled enough out of the cupcake to poke your head out. Looking at the woman who had unknowingly bought you, you saw that it was...
122.title: Well, What did you expect?

choices: You made a run for freedom
1223.content:
It was Lucy. You knew she had a thing for you though you weren't quite sure what that thing was. At times you thought it was love but at others, she was similar to a lioness stalking her prey. She had long blonde hair, green eyes, an amazing figure, and a definite dark side.
You remained trapped in your cupcake prison as you heard Lucy whistle as she brought you to her condo, that she shared with two other women. Lucy was throwing a party, and as she opened the box and saw you, you knew you were a part of it. "Omigosh! Sam! What are you doing in my cupcakes? Can't stay away from me?" she asked with a laugh as she freed you from the cupcake. You tried to explain but you could see her mind was elsewhere. After you finished she asked you a basic question, "Do you want me?" You though long and hard, if you said yes, you'd be lying, but if you said no she would probably harm you. Lucy could always read faces and could tell if you lied, most of the time.

What did you say?
1223.title: Part of the Party

13.content:
You realized that you were moving in with Nicole today. It wasn’t until eleven twenty before she arrived to pick you up. “You ready for the big day, my little love?” Nicole asked as she carried you out to her car and drove over to the apartment complex. She brought you into the apartment and you were taken back at the size. You were so happy you were moving in with your love. Nicole set you down on the kitchen counter. “I will be right back, I need to go out to the car and get something.” She said as she shut the door behind you. You looked around and liked what you saw; it was a nice place with a large kitchen, one bedroom, and a living area. You noticed the movers still had some equipment out. You were startled, however, as the door opened.

Who was it?
13.title: Moving Day

131.content:
It was just Nicole. You had been thinking about it for a while but you had finally decided to ask Nicole to marry you. As Nicole approached you asked her. "Sam!" she said through the tears, "I would love to." She then picked you up and gave you a kiss. "I would love for you to spend the rest of your life with me!" she continued, "As soon as we are settled in we will go to my Mom's house and tell her." This set you off. Nicole's mom, Veronica, hated you but never let Nicole see the hatred. A number of times she tried to add you to her cooking. However, her long red hair, divine shape, and green eyes were lovely. This also meant you had to deal with Nicole's sister, Maria. She was 22 years old, blonde hair, blue eyes, a great body, and you were pretty sure she had a crush on you. She wouldn't take the marriage news too well. "Why wait?" you said, "Let's leave now." "Alright," she responded as she stuck you in her purse and headed out the door.You couldn't believe the huge step you just took.

And so...
131.title: A BIG Question

1312.content:
Nicole couldn't believe what she had just agreed to, she would end up having to play Sam's babysitter for as long as he lived. Nicole had to get rid of him without him catching on.

Sam had no idea of Nicole's intentions when the two stopped at a local diner to grab a bite of lunch on the way. He was so excited that she had said yes, he was walking on air. Nicole took a seat at a booth near the back and asked the waitress for a cherry coke to drink. The waitress was a black haired beauty with green eyes, an attitude and a great figure, probably around 21 years old.

A few minutes later, the waitress returned with the coke and asked Nicole what she wanted to order. Nicole had made up her mind. She knew she needed something that would totally hide Sam while she did the deed. Knowing this, Nicole ordered a double decker sandwich of tomato, cheese, lettuce, onion, cucumber, ketchup, and mayo on white. While her order was being filled, Nicole kept Sam occupied until her sandwich arrived. "Sam, I've made a big mistake," Nicole said with a tear in her eye, "I can't marry you. In fact, I am ending this relationship. So just be a good boy and climb onto my sandwich. Don't make this any more difficult, please." Sam was shocked, not only was the relationship over, but Nicole wanted to eat him. Sam thought for a second on his course of action.

How did Sam react?
1312.title: Lunch Stop

choices: She bites down, but he slips out and onto her tongue. She swallows him whole....
She bites down....Crrruuunch! Munch, munch, crunch.
13123.content:
Sam heard the unmistakeable rumbling of Nicole's belly. He had heard it many times before when he was at her place and they snuggled up to each other with him using her belly as a soft pillow. Every time he had heard it in the past she had wasted no time in getting up and getting herself something to eat. He looked up and away from her belly and up to her face. She smiled and preformed a sexy and slow lip licking. He couldn't help feeling a pleasurable chill go along his body from looking at her hungrily staring at him. He sort of understood her position in the matter. With him being so small, there wasn't much for her to do but watch over him 24/7 and make sure nothing happened to him.
         They had had pleasurable times together in her bedroom, with him crawling all over her body and the times he had to hold his breathe when he got close to her womanhood and she playfully stuffed him inside. That was fun and all, but they wouldn't be able to raise a family. Nicole's belly growled for a second time and snapped him out of his thoughts. It woke his mind up and he knew what he had to do. He was going to help Nicole by answering the call of her belly. It wanted good food, and he was going to be the food. He wanted to be with Nicole and live with her for the rest of their lives, but since he couldn't have that, he might as well have the next best thing. He nodded to her then climbed and slipped into her sandwich in between the cheese and wiggled though the sticky ketchup to the other side and poked his head out.
         Nicole picked up the sandwich and brought it up to her face, "Good choice my little morsel." Sam shouted, "Yes, I love you and since it isn't practical for us to marry and you to take care of me, I might as well help you feed that that sexy belly of yours. I'll nourish your body and become a part of you. I can think of no other way to end my life than being devoured by my hot and sexy girlfriend." Nicole smiled, "Aaawwww, my loyal little Sam, an honorable guy until the end. We'll my little morsel, my belly wants to meet you." Sam looked on as her sexy red lips parted and she opened her mouth wide and he was moved closer and closer. Her breathe was minty fresh and he could see her tongue salivating in anticipation of his arrival. He had wondered before if she was going to eat him right away or save him for the last bite. He was bathed in humid darkness as her mouth engulfed the middle area he was in. He guessed she was wasting no time in devouring him.

How might it end?
13123.title: Loyal Lunch

133.content:
The landlady entered and swiftly swept you into her pocket. "I don't tolerate pests," she said as she made her way back to her office. She set you on her desk and you got a good look. She was a blacked haired female with blue eyes, a gorgeous figure and a touch of deviance. "My name is Morgan," she said, "and you are my prisoner." You begged but to no avail. She had a list of cores for you to do. "Pick one or I will punish you." she said. You looked at the list that was on the desk.

Which chore did you pick?
133.title: Pest Control

134.content:
To your surprise, a strange female entered. “Hello?” she said. She looked about 23, had long dirty blonde hair, green eyes and an amazing body. She looked about the apartment and locked her eyes on you. “Why hello there, little guy. My name is Petra. I am your neighbor. Let me show you to my roommate.” With that, you were quickly swept out of you apartment and carried next door. Petra then showed you to her roommate, an oriental female, about 22 with flowing black hair, brown eyes, and a divine figure. “You fool!” she said to Petra as she showed you to her, “You just can’t go around stealing people. We need to get rid of the evidence.” You became nervous as you heard the oriental female, whose name was Kiyoko, say this. As you listened to their conversation, you picked up on two choices. They planned to either eat you with lunch or abandon you somewhere in the town.

Which option did they choose?
134.title: Welcome Gift

1341.content:
To your dismay, they planned to eat you. Petra proceeded to tie you up and leave you on the counter as she and Kiyoko talked. “All right, little morsel,” Kiyoko said, “The least we can do is let you pick who and how has you for lunch.” You looked at the two choices. If you picked Petra, you were to become a part of her sandwich. However, if you picked Kiyoko, you’d be added to her sushi rolls. This was a tough choice but you had to decide.

Who did you decide?
1341.title: Having A Neighbor For Lunch

13412.content:
In the end, you chose Kiyoko. “Oh yay!” she said as she picked you up, “This is going to be so much fun.” As Kiyoko brought you over to her plate of sushi, you saw Petra run out of the apartment. However, you had no time to worry about that as Kiyoko stuffed you into one of her sushi rolls. The cold rice stung against your bare skin. Kiyoko then picked up a pair of chop sticks and began eating her sushi. It wasn’t long before your roll was chosen. She dunked it in soy sauce and you had to hold your breath as you were submerged in the soy. You now were face to face with Kiyoko’s lovely maw, her tongue licked her luscious lips and soon two rows of teeth were revealed. You knew this was the end for you.

Are you able to reform?
13412.title: How You Roll

134122.content: In no time you found yourself in a hot humid cavern. All you could do now was avoid being crushed by her teeth. You couldn’t believe this was how you were going to leave this world. The day started out with so much promise as you were moving in with your love. But now you were a part of an Asian beauty’s lunch. You now landed in her stomach with a splash. You knew there was nothing you could do, so you climbed up on the remains of her lunch and waited for the end. At one point you thought you heard Nicole’s worried voice asking if anyone had seen you. “I love you, Nicole.” You said just as you blacked out from the smell.
134122.title: Sam Rolled

choices: You wanted to start having fun
14.content:
You remembered you had to hang out with Kiandra today. Kimberly made you spend time with her daughter at least twice a week. At around seven thirty, Kiandra arrived to pick you up. “We are going to have so much fun today!” she said as she threw you in her pocketbook and headed back to her house. Though Kimberly spent most of the day at your house, she still had her own. Eventually Kiandra pulled you out of her pocketbook and set you on the kitchen counter. “What should we do today?” she asked, just then her stomach growled, “That reminds me, I haven’t had breakfast yet. Let me make us some breakfast. What can I make you, my little friend, or would you rather get right to our fun day?” Breakfast sounded like a good idea. You knew Kiandra could cook a good breakfast.

What did you ask for?
14.title: The Governess’s Daughter

142.content:
"Coming right up!" Kiandra said as she began preparing the ingredients for the breakfast sandwich. She laced one slice of buttered bread in the frying pan, followed by some cheese, an egg, then she stopped. "You know what would go great on this?" she asked with a smile. You seemed weary as you recognized that grin. As you prepared to run, her hand came down.

What did she grab?
142.title: Most Important Meal

choices: Go to the office with her
144.content:
“Oh, I see,” Kiandra said with a sigh, “You don’t want any breakfast. That’s fine. What do you want to do for fun?” You thought about this question. You knew Kiandra was disappointed with you and was going to want revenge. You knew you needed to pick an activity that was the least likely to harm you. “Look,” she said, “We can either play hide-and-seek, you could come with me while I head to work for a little while, or go hang out with some friends of mine.” You weighed your choices. Kiandra worked at a big corporation as a secretary. You quickly decided.

How did you decide?
144.title: Fun Time

1442.content:
You decided to go to the office with her. She worked at a large firm and was a secretary for the CEO of the company. She stuck you in her cleavage and went to work. You got comfortable as she typed on the computer at her desk and eventually you fell asleep. A while later you awoke to find Kiandra placing you in the break room fridge. "This is for rejecting my breakfast!" she said as she closed the fridge door. You now found yourself in the cold of the fridge. You needed to find warmth. You saw some partially opened containers. One was labeled "Harriet" and the other was labeled "Veronica". You were freezing, and had to climb inside one.

Which one did you enter?
1442.title: Working Hard

15.content:
To your dismay you remembered you had to spend time with your sisters. Kimberly made you do this at least four times a week. This was the first time you had to do it without any protection. You knew this was dangerous and you needed to be careful about how you handled it. The first thing you had to do was decide which sister you were going to spend time with. Mona was a risky option but she was pretty fun. Celia wasn’t that bad but had her dark moments. You needed to decide.

Which sister?
15.title: Sibling Time

151.content:
You decided to give Mona a chance. She awoke not much later, and you told her what you had decided. “You sure of that, my little squirt?” she asked. Nonetheless, you decided this was the best choice. “If you insist,” she said as she picked you up, “I got to go to work today but you can come along.” You then found yourself heading to the mega grocery store with Mona. Before too long, you found yourself in Mona’s apron pocket as she was stocking the shelves with groceries. The grocery store was huge; it had a deli, a candy shop, even a built-in restaurant. Suddenly, Mona slipped as she was shelving. Her fall sent you flying, but luckily you landed safely on a package of towels. You needed to be discovered.

Where did you go for help?
151.title: Mona Madness

choices: She was talking to the customer
1511.content:
You figured the deli was as good a place as any to go for help. As you made your way over to the deli, you had to avoid the various feet, and wheels. Eventually, you made it and began climbing the drawers to reach the counter top. No one was there at the moment you reached the counter but just then a shadow came upon you. You jumped out of the way in the nick of time as two giant slices of bread were thrown down on the work top. You knew the normal size of bread, but this was unusually large. Once you escaped you tried to make contact but you had jumped right into the vegetable bin as the hand hovered above you. Just then the hand stopped and you heard the female's voice.

What happened?
1511.title: Make Mine A Small

152.content:
You decided Celia was the better choice. It wasn’t too long before she awoke and you told her of your decision. “That is so sweet,” she said as she gave you a kiss, “but I have to work today. I know! You can come with me to the park. It’ll be fun!” Before you could object, Celia picked you up, stuffed you in the breast pocket of her uniform and headed to work. She had a pretty easy job, but nothing to laugh at. You held your head out of the pocket and looked around; there were a lot of people in the park on the sunny day. There were picnics going on, photographers and joggers. As you were admiring the view, Celia broke out into a run; this sudden action threw you out of her pocket and onto the green grass. She had no idea you were missing. You needed to find some help. You looked around.

Where did you go for help?
152.title: Sam and Celia At The City Park

choices: In the hand of one of the females
Still in the basket, and hungry
On the counter at the female's apartment.
1521.content:
The closet people were two females enjoying a picnic together. They seemed to be about 23, they both had blonde hair and blue eyes, you figured they were twins. Regardless, you started to make your way across the vast expanse of grass to reach the picnic. The journey was long, but you made it. As you tried to get their attention, you realized they were too busy talking on their cell phones to notice you. You decided to climb the picnic basket to get a higher vantage point. The wicker made the climb effortless and before you knew it, you were on top of the picnic basket. But before you could start waving, a gust of wind came through and knocked you off your feet. You feel into the basket and blacked out. Minutes later you awoke.

Where were you?
1521.title: More than Just Ants At A Picnic

15211.content: Your eyes opened and sunlight flooded into your once dark vision. They opened to see the face of a very pretty girl, and you thought you had died by getting stomped on or something. On the contrary, as you focused, you realized this woman was much MUCH bigger than you and it came to you that you were in the hand of one of the girls you saw at the picnic. "Look Amanda! He opened his eyes! What a cute little man!" said your captor. Her sister's name was apparently Amanda, "Really Gina? Let me see!" Both girls looked at you in awe. "Well little man, my name is Gina, and this is my sister Amanda!" "Uhh my name is Sam" you said awkwardly. "Well little Sam, your name isn't going to matter in a bit, because I'm very very hungry and food doesn't have names!" said Amanda. "No way Amanda, I found him! And by the way, I bet he'd like to go in my belly better! Its so much softer and squishier than yours!" said Gina. "That's because your faat!" retaliated Amanda. Of course they were twins, and both the same body type, and it seemed to you that Amanda had a little more meat around her waist than Gina did. They both tackled eachother to the ground and were currently sprawling over which one gets to swallow you whole and alive. Who wins?
15211.title: Two ways you can go, but you won't like either

choices: Time to fuel a creature higher on the food chain
152112.content:
Gina was on top, and she wrapped her hands around Amanda's neck and bashed her head against the ground until she was unconscious.

Gina looked at you, and said "you know what? I was lying when I said it was soft and squishy. I said that it was so that it would sound better, but really, I have a very acidic stomach! I hope your pH is high so your body can neutralize my acid... Of course, you will die in the process, but... You have to go now.
152112.title: Gina

info.brief_description: A small adventure. You're shrunk, try to survive. GPs for great additions. Add for an Add!
info.description:
A few rules before we start:
1.All entries should be in second person. (You then…)
2.All entries should use good grammar, be at least five descriptive sentences and have a creative title
3.Only original characters please. No other males. The age for any new female is 18-38.
4.No animals
5.Please no unbirth, foot crush, or toilet stuff. Keep it respectable
6.If you are to be eaten, I would prefer it be in a food item such as sandwich, cake, pie, taco, etc.
7.There can be no additional size change.
8.You can add an option to reform after death but it takes a day and returns you back to your bed.
9.Be descriptive with any new characters.
10. Please try to preserve the continuity between chapters.
11.I can’t think of anything else. Use your best judgment and have fun!

Background:
Your name is Sam Johnson, a brown haired, brown eyed, 18 year old male. Only thing is, you are three inches tall. When you were younger, you were exposed to some chemicals at home that made you shrink. You live as normal a life as you can. You have two sisters, and a girlfriend. Your aunt lives with you for your “safety”, you attend part-time technical college, and you have a job at the local bakery. You feel safe. Everyone, from your sisters, to your girlfriend, to your coworkers has expressed intentions to devour or enslave you. Now that you are eighteen, you are no longer protected as you once were, and must try to survive by yourself as you try to make it on your own.
Notable Females:
Mona: She is your sister, one part in a twin tandem. She is 25 and has blonde hair, green eyes, a great build, and a dominant temperament. She lives at home but works at the mega grocery as a clerk.
Celia: The other sister. She shares the same appearance as Mona, but has a very different temperament. She is kinder but is very vengeful. She also lives at home and works at the city park as an attendant. She has treated you well, for the most part.
Kimberly: The governess. She is 37 and has black hair, blue eyes, a great body for her age, and a fiendish side. There have been plenty of time you have seen her look at you while she cooks. She has an 18 year old daughter named Kiandra. She has long blonde hair, icy blue eyes, an excellent build and a nice personality. You think she’d protect you but she is a culinary arts major and you can’t be sure. Kiandra comes and visits her mom frequently.
Nicole: Your girlfriend. She is 20 and has long flowing black hair, emerald green eyes, and a divine body. She loves to play with you and is only a threat when angered. You know not to argue with her. Recently she has asked you to move in with her.
